Summary • CCNA, CCNA Security and CCNP, combined B.S. and M.S. in Computer Science, 6 years of working experience in network configuration, implementation, deployment and troubleshooting.  
• Experienced in configuration/installation/troubleshooting of Cisco Routers/Switches/Firewalls and  
Dell, HP routers/switches.  
• Extensive working experience in configuration of DHCP, GRE/IPSEC VPN (des/3des/aes/aes-256), OSPF, static routes, RIP, ACL, NAT/PAT, SNMP, NTP, VLAN, VTP, trunking ISL/802.1q, spanning-tree, Virtual Interfaces, STP, RSTP.  
• Have a strong knowledge of working and security aspects of TCP/IP and OSI model.  
• Extensive knowledge in configuring and troubleshooting various routing protocols BGP, EIGRP, OSPF, IS-IS, IGRP, RIP.  
• High knowledge of IP addressing schemes like VLSM and IP services to meet medium level enterprise level network requirement. Chief of Networking Section - Senior Cisco Engineer Albanian Ministry of Interior - State Police July 2010  –  August 2011  (1 year 2 months) Albania • Developed and established new standards and procedures for the Networking Section.  
• Managed the networking team responsible for 500+ node network.  
• Support and provide assistance to 24/7 NOC team.  
• Analyzed/designed/implemented the Backup project of 35 branch offices using satellite link to provide redundancy for the Border Crossing of Albania. The project consisted in configuration of GRE/ IPSEC tunnels using OSPF routing protocol to connect remote offices to the central datacenter (main satellite link connection). Cisco 1800, 2800, 3500.  
• Analyzed/Designed/Implemented/troubleshoot VPNs over internet using Cisco routers/ASA firewalls/non Cisco devices to connect 20 banks with Ministry of Interior. Configured IPSEC VPN tunnels using IKE preshared keys, 3DES/aes-256 algorithm in ESP tunnel mode. ASA 5525, Cisco 2800, 3500, 4000.  
• Engineered a SNMP solution using Orion Solarwinds. Build/installed/configured the Microsoft 2008 server. Installation of Orion Solarwinds application, make in monitor 1000+ devices server/router/switch/firewall/antena/wireless/pbx, etc. Monitored network activity by analyzing information provided by Orion Solarwinds to ensure both efficient and effective network operation.  
• Responsible for building the network on the new offices and management of existing 500 node network (router, switches, etc.) distributed to 100 remote sites throughout Albania. Cisco Engineer Albanian Ministry of Interior - State Police December 2009  –  July 2010  (8 months) Tirana, Albania • Responsible of new Installations/configurations and maintenance of 500+ node Cisco network (router /switch /firewall) distributed in different remote sites.

Creation of groups/users and giving the right permissions and integrated with ASA firewall for SSL VPN users.  
• Configured ASA outbound access for access control, NAT and PAT, IPSEC encryption, and security levels for inside/outside network, and DMZ  
• Designed/implemented the migration from RIPv2 routing protocol to an OSPF multiple area network.  
• Routing on Cisco 1800,2800, 3600 series router: DHCP, Site-to-Site Gre over IPSec vpn, extended/standard ACL, route map, NAT/PAT, dynamic OSPF routing protocol, static routing protocol, SNMP to monitor network devices, ntp to syncronize network devices,etc.  
• Switching on Cisco Catalyst 2950, 2960, 3560, 3750: Configuration of VLANs, VTP, trunks (ISL, Dot1q), spanning-tree, Etherchannel, inter-VLAN routing, virtual interfaces, etc
